member.name: IPropertyEnumType2.GetImageReference
member.summary: Retrieves the image reference associated with a property enumeration.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer that, when this method returns successfully, receives a string of the form <dll name>,-<resid> that is suitable to be passed to .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPropertyEnumType2
member.summary: Exposes methods that extract data from enumeration information. extends .
